#Text=State of emergency in Sri Lanka remains despite calm returning after violence
#Text=Wednesday , March 14 , 2018
#Text=Map highlighting the Central Province , Sri Lanka for which Kandy is the administrative center .
#Text=Image : Jeroen .
#Text=Schools reopened on Monday in Sri Lanka and the government said they had arrested hundreds of people for participating in anti-Muslim riots .
#Text=A state of emergency remained in effect in the island nation which had been gripped by widespread violence which started in the Central Province .
#Text=At least two people died .
#Text=At least eleven mosques were reported torched and 200 homes and businesses burned when the violence was at its peak .
#Text=Police reported 230 arrests , both for direct involvement and for spreading anti-
#Text=Muslim hate speech on the internet .
#Text=Police said to expect more arrests in coming days .
#Text=Lifting of the state of emergency was expected , according to Al Jazeera , but had not occurred as of Monday .
#Text=Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe visited Kandy District over the weekend and told reporters victims will be compensated for damages .

#Text=Ever since a nearly three decade long civil war came to an end in 2009 , relations between Sri Lanka 's Sinhalese Buddhist majority and Tamil Sunni Muslim minority have remained tense , but largely peaceful until this month .
#Text=On March 4 , in the village of Teldeniya a traffic accident escalated into a fight wherein a group of young Muslim men beat a Buddhist man , who later died , according to Al Jazeera .
#Text=On March 5 , hundreds of Sinhalese , whom local residents and officials said were from outside the city , took to the streets of Kandy .
#Text=The mob targeted Muslims ' homes and businesses , setting several of them on fire .
#Text=A Muslim man 's dead body was found inside one of the burned buildings .
#Text=By March 6 , the Sri Lankan government had declared a state of emergency and imposed a curfew on the region .
#Text=The emergency declaration by President Maithripala Sirisena allowed the army to be called into action .
#Text=Nevertheless , the unrest and violence spread to several towns surrounding Kandy .
#Text=Government officials surmised the rioters were coordinating their attacks at specific locations through social media .
#Text=Internet access was cut off for the province , and social media including Facebook , WhatsApp and Viber were blocked for the entire country .
#Text=" Technology created to bring people together is being used to pull people apart .
